pages.text: Parhybodus is a genus that is sometimes given to hybodont shark species Hybodus plicatilis and Hybodus longiconus. Many records of "Hybodus" are known from Triassic, however since the genus Hybodus is a wastebasket taxon, it is not clear whether actual Hybodus lived in the Triassic.
